title: At the Black Gate
author: VD
content_html: I have defended HBO from charges of attempting to gay up A Game of Thrones over at the Black Gate, even though I don’t think the producers handled one significant relationship in a particularly adroit manner. The relevant literary case is not quite as overwhelming as Fight Club, but it is sufficiently strong as to be conclusive.
content_text:
I have defended HBO from charges of attempting to gay up
A Game of Thrones
over
at the Black Gate
, even though I don’t think the producers handled one significant relationship in a particularly adroit manner.  The relevant literary case is not quite as overwhelming as
